xml:
Spray
Cautionary and advisory labels

Label 15 - Caution: flammable. Keep your body away from fire or flames after you have put on the medicine

Excipients

May contain

Cetostearyl alcohol (including cetyl and stearyl alcohol), hydroxybenzoates (parabens), wool fat and related substances including lanolin

Sprilon aerosol spray <ph outputclass="manufacturer">(Ayrton Saunders Ltd)</ph> 2973011000001105

Dimeticone 10.4 mg per 1 gram

Zinc oxide 125 mg per 1 gram

  • 115 gram GSL

    NHS indicative price = £8.90

    Drug Tariff (Part VIIIA Category C) price = £8.90

BARRIER CREAMS AND OINTMENTS
